video_info.title: Super Smash 2025/26 Men's
video_info.shortDescription: Canterbury Kings face the Otago Volts in a crucial Super Smash 2026 clash at Hagley Oval on January 21, with both sides eager to strengthen their playoff chances. Expect a thrilling contest as Canterbury look to maintain their top-three spot while Otago aim to upset their rivals with aggressive batting. Find out who comes on top as we bring you all the action from the Super Smash 2025/26 Men's, LIVE on Sony LIV.
